p: The fruits of Z. coreanum were used in this study. The fruits were collected in experimental forest of National institute of forest science located on Jin-ju city, republic of Korea, in August 2017. Taxonomical identifications were established by the ecologist Dr. Hwa-Ja Hyeon at warm temperate and subtropical forest research center of national institute of forest science and the voucher specimen code was WTFRC 10030535.
